author: Emma Roth
title: Apple plans ‘Scary Fast’ product event just before Halloween
description: Apple is planning a streaming event on October 30th at 8PM ET. The invitation doesn’t say what’s in store, but recent rumors suggest we could see updates for the iMac and MacBook Pro.
